name: Jack Rose Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Japanese Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a Cherry.

name: Jersey Cocktail
instruction: Place ice and bitters in a large tumbler. Fill with Cider and stir slightly.
note: Recipe from the Hoffman House, New York.

name: Jockey Club Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and squeeze Lemon Peel on top.

name: John Collins
instruction: Add ice, lemon juice, sugar, and gin to a large tumbler. Fill with Soda Water and stir well.
note: London Gin is sometimes used in this drink.

name: J.O.S. Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and squeeze Lemon Peel on top.

name: Journalist Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jupiter Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
